rukus.text: Ne ulia wikhola omuwofu khumakhuwa ka Nyasaye, khulamukholela Shetani abe omwitsa wuwe
Ne totobo babekalilanga injila, ne abeene baparanga mbu balunjika
Okhula shinga balikhwitsila baliboola mbu: “ oh manyanga oba ehale ninasi shinga ebukwe nende mumbo, oli omwitsa omubii muno.”
Ne khulwokhuba mbu mwakhola obubii, shibulaho shilabakhoonya enywe olwalelo mbu musanganga mwesi mushinyasio
Koo onyala okhukhola abekala amarwi bawulila, nohomba onyala okhulunjisia abawofu bali mubukori bwahabulafu
Ne kata nikhukhuhiniaho, efwe khwitsa okhubahelesia likhobo liefu khubo
Nohomba	khulakhwechesia akakhwabalaka, nafu toto khuli nende obunyali khubo
Mana tilana nende akawafimbulilwa , toto ewe oli khunjila ingololofu
Netoto kano ni ametsulisio khwiwe nende khubandu bao, ne mulitsa okhurebwa
Ne reba Abakhwaruma imbeli wuwo mubarumwa befu, koo khwakhola abanyasaye bandi balamwe balali Owetsimbabaasi ? (Nyasaye)
